data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Chennai are far from Jesus.
Lord, help the people of Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India to the gospel today.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Vallon people.
Spirit, defend the church in the county of Chennai against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Chennai
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Chennai
